banner.slogan: <0>Web Development</0> is an art, and your project is our <1>masterpiece</1>.
banner.main_paragraph1: I am a <0>{{linkText}}</0>, Software Development Engineer with <1>3+ years of freelance experience</1> and complex projects in Laravel, React, and Vue.
banner.paragraph1: <0>I master the full development cycle</0> (design, automated unit testing, CI/CD, and more).
banner.paragraph2: Specialized in <0>scalable architectures, REST APIs, performance optimization, and leadership</0> of small teams.
banner.paragraph3: I deliver <0>high-quality results under tight deadlines</0>, combining technical precision with strategic vision.
banner.description_tooltip: The mysterious one-man band, capable of operating both on the front-end and the back-end.
banner.typeAnimation_3: Frontend Developer with React.js and Vue.js
banner.portfolio_source_code_text: This site was entirely built by me — [View source code]

other_skills_list.0: Fast adoption of new tools and methodologies.
other_skills_list.1: Problem-solving under pressure and tight deadlines.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.select_category: Select a category to see the projects I have developed in that area

paragraphs.0: Full Stack Developer based in La Paz, Mexico. About to graduate as a Software Development Engineer, <0>maintaining an average grade of 92 out of 100</0>.
paragraphs.1: Over time, I discovered that, without a doubt, <0>my greatest strength is engineering</0>.
paragraphs.2: I am passionate about creating tools that are as useful as they are fascinating. <0>I aspire to master everything necessary to build high-level software</0>.
paragraphs.3: Currently, <0>I dedicate most of my time to developing both technical and soft skills that enhance my professional performance</0>.
paragraphs.4: 'It's not just about solving problems, but anticipating and eliminating them before they arise'.

contact.description: If you have any questions or need more information, don’t hesitate to reach out. I’m here to help you build something great.

footer.technologies_used: This website was developed using React.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.

projectDetail.features_description: This section showcases a multimedia demonstration of the project's key features, designed and implemented with scalable architecture principles, optimal performance, and user-centered design. Each element highlights my ability to translate complex specifications into solid, well-executed solutions.
